entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rust built WASM library in Blazor project fails on wasm-opt when being published #53034
  • BlazorWasm benchmark broken (docker version) #53033
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #53031
  • Add a AddDefaultProblemDetailsFactory method that allows registering the internal `DefaultProblemDetailsFactory` class with the container #53030
  • Blazor Web App when in debug mode is OK but when pushed to server then problem #53029
  • .NET Core 8+ Api failing intermittently (w/ Swagger) #53028
  • ClickOnce generates unnessesary and breaking staticwebassets.runtime.json file #53027
  • Happy Holidays, everyone! Responses for issues may be delayed till early January #53026
  • HtmlHelperOptions.CheckBoxHiddenInputRenderMode is ignored #53025
  • Issue with multiple EditForm on the same page #53019
  • Remove call UseRouting #53018
  • High Memory Usage on AMD EPYC 7282 Compared to Intel Xeon E5-2630 v4 with .NET 8.0 #53017

Closed

  • [Feature Request][ Blazor New API Security end points Please have better Linkage between new security api end points /login / logout etc storing of tokens and the Blazor Web App New Project Template #53006
  • AuthorizeView non-functional with InteractiveServer and Windows (Negotiate) Auth #52921
  • Razor compiler emits neither warning nor error when binding against non-existent property. #53020
  • Auth For Blazor To Be One #53007
  • Blazor 8 Render mode breaks migrations over 3rd party components. #53008
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter, updates #52992

PullRequests

Created

  • Add polymorphic support to SignalR STJ #53035
    area-signalr
  • Skip npm get-version to unblock builds #53032
    area-infrastructure
  • fix: Added missing AddOptions() to AddLocalization. #53016
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Updated

  • Populate the ValidIssuer and the ValidAudience properties of the JwtBearerOptions.TokenValidationParameters. #52821
    area-auth, area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/6.0] [Blazor] Fix duplicated place holder in log message #53009
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Update Login.razor to pass ApplicationUser to SignInManager instead o… #52984
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Avoid call to ASCII.GetBytes during HostFilteringMiddleware static initialization #52978
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-middleware
  • Using FrozenDictionaries in IEndpointAddressScheme implementations #52854
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Add ForgotPasswordRequest to STJ source generation context #52830
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • JSInterop: Enable returning null for a nullable value type #52908
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Make Identity tests use public API to configure EF. #52910
    area-identity, pending-ci-rerun
  • Skip failing Libuv test on Alpine #52912
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 6.0.x
  • Annotate Http.Connections for trimming #52918
    area-signalr, linker-friendliness, pending-ci-rerun
